channel.title: DaVinci Resolve-notes on Petfactory
channel.description: Recent content in DaVinci Resolve-notes on Petfactory

item.title: DaVinci Resolve - Python
item.description: An old scripting guide can be found here Python & Lua Historically FusionScript was Lua only, some methods that return multiple statements have a special Table() suffix variant to return the proper table for use in Python. As the Lua collection is a tuple, you will need to pass a dictionary to the API in many cases, even when it seems to be treated like a list. So each Value needs to have a key in the order of the entry.

item.title: DaVinci Resolve - Fusion
item.description: Quick tips Auto Save Auto save (live save) is on by default and you might want to turn it off. DaVinci Resolve > Preferences > Project Save and Load > Save Settings > Live save Bookmarks You can add bookmarks with Ctrl + D Underlays can also function as bookmarks Also in 3 dot menu Page Edit Shift + 4 Fusion Shift + 5 Color Shift + 6 Viewers There are two viewers.

item.title: DaVinci Resolve - Edit
item.description: Quick tips Import png & jpeg as a sequence By default it seems like exr will import as a sequence but jpeg and png as stills. If you want to import png & jpeg as sequences On the media page, click on the “3 dot menu” in the Media Storage section (top left) Frame Display Mode > Sequence Auto Save Auto save (live save) is on by default and you might want to turn it off.
